title: skill-index.md uses short names but Skill tool needs full names
description: skill-index.md lists skills as /prd but Skill tool expects golem-powers:prd. Claude tries short name first, fails, then tries full name. Fix generate-skill-index.sh to output full names.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update ~/.claude/scripts/generate-skill-index.sh to output full names (e.g., /golem-powers:prd not /prd)
Test: Claude invokes skill on first try with full name
Update any CLAUDE.md files that reference short names
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-031 skill-index uses full golem-powers:xxx names
